Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、サレたちは、スールズ以外の村でも ヒューマの女の子たちをさらってるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think Saleh and his forces are kidnapping Huma girls from other towns as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズのような辺境まで来るくらいだ。可能性は ある。だが<Blue>王の盾<White>があんな事をするとは……
Entry.EnglishText: It's possible, given that they came all the way to a remote village like Sulz. As to why they would do that...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>は 何のためにあんな事を……
女王様が友達を欲しがってる、とか？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe the Queen wants some friends? Something like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: まさかな。<Blue>四星<White>を使ってまで やるような事ではないだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I doubt it. Her Majesty would never use the <Blue>Four Stars<White> for such a thing.

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、クレアは なぜ、何のために……
Entry.EnglishText: Then why would they kidnap Claire...?
